Writer: Mitchell Kapner (characters), Mitchell Kapner (story), George Gallo (screenplay)
Title: The Whole Ten Yards
Plot: Jimmy the Tulip's (Willis) quiet new life is shaken up by his old pal Oz (Perry), whose wife (Henstridge) has been kidnapped by a Hungarian mob. The Tulip and his wife Jill (Peet) spring into action.
Actors: Bruce Willis, Matthew Perry, Amanda Peet, Kevin Pollak
